body:
Hello guys, my friend recently started a youtube channel, he has only 100 subs, but has quality content and great editing. Check him out https://www.youtube.com/user/SoaringBoat, it would make his day if you subbed and left a like!
https://www.youtube.com/user/SoaringBoat
